sentences.en: A series of parallel strips of rectangular section is cemented over a lower sheet.
sentences.cn: 使用一组截面为矩形的互相平行的试条,并将它们粘贴在一薄片上.

sentences.en: Asked how cutting makes use of the rectangular plate height h minimum?
sentences.cn: 问如何切割使得所使用的矩形板的高度h最小?

sentences.en: Construct a set of rectangular axes and resolve any inclined forces into rectangular components.
sentences.cn: 作一组直角坐标轴,把各力都分解成正交分量.

sentences.en: Each comb plate is a simple rectangular paddle composed of cilia.
sentences.cn: 每个栉板都是纤毛组成的矩形的桨.

sentences.en: In Fig. 6 - 1 ( c ), the motion of a particle is referred to by a rectangular coordinate system.
sentences.cn: 在图6-1 ( c ) 中, 质点的运动是用直角坐标系来描述的.

sentences.en: Rectangular plastic cards coated with magnetic material are employed in this device.
sentences.cn: 这种装置使用涂有磁性材料的矩形塑料卡片.

sentences.en: Small rectangular backup bars were used to fabricate the web - bottom flange connection.
sentences.cn: 在腹板与下翼缘的施焊中使用小矩形挡板.

sentences.en: Square bins ( sides of equal length ) are easier to stack in stores or packhouses than rectangular bins.
sentences.cn: 正方形果箱 ( 两边长度相等 ) 比长方形果箱更容易地在贮藏库或包装间内堆放.

sentences.en: Subsite, of a Site - An area found within the site, also rectangular.
sentences.cn: 局部子表面 - 局部表面内的区域, 也是矩形的.

sentences.en: The curve - edged hobbing cutter is used in producing rectangular wing sanitary napkin.
sentences.cn: 曲线刃滚切刀是用来加工护翼卫生巾的专用刀具.

sentences.en: The equations are written in rectangular coordinates.
sentences.cn: 这些方程是在直角座标系中写出的.

sentences.en: The rectangular groove guide ( RGG ) is analyzed by finite element method ( FEM ) .
sentences.cn: 本文用有限元法分析了 矩形槽 波导.

sentences.en: Tong uses the model to analyse the effect of a rectangular obstruction in a channel.
sentences.cn: 董使用“混合”模型研究了管道中有矩形障碍物时所产生的影响.

sentences.en: Vector differences may also be found by the method of rectangular resolution.
sentences.cn: 矢量差也可用正交分解求得.

sentences.en: We have shown surface tractions on three rectangular boundary surfaces of the body.
sentences.cn: 在这个单元体的三个互相垂直的边界上,我们指明了作用在这些边界面上的面力.

phrases.tran_cn: 矩形管，方形管；矩形断面管；长方通；方通

trans.tran_cn: <数> 矩形的，成直角的，直角坐标的，长方
trans.tran_en: having the shape of a rectangle
